https://tmrev.io/movie/47161-Djomeh 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/z6abeHmE7StRSDJAYCd28bu4vaS.jpg Djomeh is a young Afghan man who has come to live in Iran because of family trouble. Working as a milk boy, he encounters discrimination from the Iranian villagers and disdain from Habib, a fellow Afghani to whose trust Djomeh was given. The only person who shows any friendliness to him is his employer, who Djomeh asks to intercede for him in asking a woman from the village for her hand in marriage. Djomeh
